page.title: 03HOUSES IN CHILMARK/TEFFONT
page.content: There are no{Council houses}in{Teffont but in{Chilmark}there are more than twenty{Council houses}and{old peoples {bungalows.}Two{private housing}estates have been built in Chilmark during the last twenty years, totalling {twenty {six}houses and about{twenty five individual houses have been built in that time.Only about{ten or eleven new houses,for farmworkers and others have been built in{Teffont Magna}in the last twenty years. There are several notable{old houses in the two villages.{Fitz House, Teffont is dated 1700, but has older features.{Chilmark Manor,}17 century with mullioned windows, and{Chilmark {House,}Regency with Doric columns forming a porch,as well as{Chilmark {old Rectory}and many smaller houses are very interesting. ANNE McGRAIL
